about_the_game:
A new ship model inspired by F/V Northwestern©. Made with as many details as possible. Get a free DLC and equip your new ship.

Show everyone who is the real king of Crab Hunters!
detailed_description:
A new ship model inspired by F/V Northwestern©. Made with as many details as possible. Get a free DLC and equip your new ship.

Show everyone who is the real king of Crab Hunters!
legal_notice: Trailer music "Irish Scotland Folk Rock" by LiveMusics
name: Deadliest Catch: The Game -  New Vessel 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 3,6GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 3,2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The new ship model inspired by F/V Northwestern ©, now available for free! Get free DLC and travel rough waters in search for biggest King Crabs.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Italian, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, French
*languages with full audio support
